attributes.action: retain the Crown symbol on drinking glasses, and to reject the proposed irrational and complex EU signs.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is proposed that the Crown symbol on drinking glassware be replaced by EU marks.

The proposed new symbols do not change the datum point in the glass, and will require additional costs from glass makers.

I wish to retain the Crown mark as a symbol of our national identity within the EU.
